summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 763 m) and light levels (up 10694 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12724 lux), cloud levels (up 1462 m), feels like temperature (up 4.5°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
